title: Missing Blue Essence Ward
body: I don't know where to submit this problem I've looked all over the support page and even tried the in game bug report. I noticed yesterday that I am missing my blue essence ward. Anyone able to help? Thank you.

replies.body: Hey there, this is a visual bug with the recent patch!  Most players are not able to see or use the ward, but it IS still in your inventory.  I don't have an eta on when the fix will roll out, but it is a known issue!

Ah, we were left a comment about it here:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/eV2OGEJP-wheres-my-essence-collector-ward?comment=0001
A few days ago. We can hope it will be fixed soon.

Edit: There's a newer reply here:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/oaIwekAj-hey-riot-wheres-my-essence-collector-ward?comment=0000
